subject: Super Bowl
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: The effort to bring the Super Bowl to the new Meadowlands, passed a threshold when the N.F.L. waived its weather rule, allowing the New York region to bid for the championship game.
snippet: The effort to bring the Super Bowl to the new Meadowlands, passed a threshold when the N.F.L. waived its weather rule, allowing the New York region to bid for the championship game.
